name: XOXO Monkey
description: XOXO is a community-driven meme token launched on the BNB Chain that integrates a unique “unlock-by-growth” mechanism. Tokens are released only when the Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV) doubles from the previous unlock level and is sustained for 15 consecutive days. Unlocks are only approved through decentralized DAO voting. This ensures that distribution is tied to organic growth and community consensus.
